sqlMap.select: select product_no as no, product_name as name, category_id as categoryId, product_img_name as imgName, product_price as price, product_summary as summary, product_sold_out as soldOut, product_type as type, product_create_date as createDate from (select * from spring_products order by dbms_random.random()) where rownum <= 4 and product_type = #value#
